resources.string: Push Notification Message Channel 1 with big picture.

Push Notification Message Channel 2: Push notifications are messages sent from an app to notify users of important events or updates, even when the app is not actively in use. These notifications can appear on the lock screen or in the notification bar, allowing users to quickly view the information. They can also be customized with different channels, sounds, and priority levels to ensure users are informed in a timely manner.
Notification permission granted. Tap again to send the notification.
